name: Simple and Delicious Beet Greens
author: Daryl Gerboth
summary: Don't throw away those hearty green leaves that top fresh bundles of beets! They have a flavor similar to kale.  This simple recipe will will help you make the most of your fresh beets!
ingredients: 1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil, or to taste
¼ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes  (Optional)
freshly ground black pepper to taste
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add the beet greens, and cook uncovered until tender, about 2 minutes
Drain in a colander, then immediately immerse in ice water for several minutes until cold to stop the cooking process
Once the greens are cold, drain well, and coarsely chop
Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat
Stir in the garlic and red pepper flakes; cook and stir until fragrant, about 1 minute
Stir in the greens until oil and garlic is evenly distributed
Cook just until greens are hot; serve with lemon wedges
